entities.name: myrtle
entities.description: Myrtle is a person who is described as giving a tragic sob and diving head first into the toilet. She is mentioned to have come to rest somewhere in the U-bend after her muffled sobs were heard from that direction.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who stood with his mouth open and witnessed Myrtle's incident. He closed the door on Myrtle's gurgling sobs.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who stood with Harry and Hermione, and was having a look around in the girls' bathroom for clues.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who shrugged wearily and said that Myrtle's incident was almost cheerful. She suggested going with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: percy weasley
entities.description: Percy Weasley is a person who stopped dead at the head of the stairs, wearing a prefect badge and an expression of complete shock on his face. He was shocked to see Ron in the girls' bathroom.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is a person who is mentioned as being similar to Percy Weasley's mannerisms.

relationships.description: Ron was having a look around in the girls' bathroom for clues.
Percy Weasley scolded Ron for being in the girls' bathroom.
